name: Pinball Star
description:
Ok sharpen up your pinball skills.

Three Game Modes.

50 Stars- Collect stars to move to next level, once 50 stars are collected, Shoot Hoops will be Unlocked.
Collect gems, and use them to skip levels if you get stuck.

Shoot Hoops- Challenge your skills trying to shoot hoops pinball style. Collect gems to use to save ball, which restart with your score you lost with.

Endless- is the same as levels , but endless and random with generated levels.

Features-
Collect gems to unlock new balls.
One tap game play
Three Game modes.
Leader board to challenge your friends.
